text: Puerto Rico Highway 212 (PR-212) is a north–south bypass located south of downtown Isabela, Puerto Rico. This road extends from the junction of PR-2 with PR-4494 to PR-4472, near PR-112, and is known as Carretera Santiago Polanco Abreu. ==Major intersections== ==See also== *List of highways numbered 212 ==References== ==External links== * 212 Category:Isabela, Puerto Rico
title: Puerto Rico Highway 212
